message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  I think it could really benefit you. Given its value, I'm offering it at $14,000. What do you think?

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me in the middle at $12,500?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $11,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you at $13,500. This still offers you a great deal compared to its true worth.
I understand your point, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. Can you consider $12,750?
